Family Information Night

Friday, Feb. 20, 6-8pm
Unitarian Church
6300 A St
Lincoln, NE 68510

Come learn about Bluestem Montessori Elementary School, opening in August 2017!

Our Executive Director and Head Teacher will present on how the school will run and on Montessori elementary education more generally. You will learn what a day in our school will look like! Bring your questions. You do NOT need to be enrolled yet to come and learn about our school - all interested families are welcome.

Childcare will be provided, but please RSVP so we know how many children to expect.
